item.title: Widgets for Charity
item.description:
The holiday season is a time for giving, and this year, technology is making it easier than ever to support causes we care about. “America’s Giving Challenge,” a contest using “charity badges,” harnesses the power of social networks and the internet to raise money for charities. The contest is backed by Kevin Bacon, who is known for his association with the “six degrees of separation” concept. His website, SixDegrees.org, supports celebrity charities and promotes the Charity Badge...

item.title: Chumby Kicks the Clock Radio to the Curb
item.description:
Are traditional alarm clocks and radios truly effective ways to wake up? Imagine a more modern approach: starting your day with your favorite internet radio station, a quick weather and market update, and a glimpse at your online auctions. You could even catch up on news and sports or play a game. All of this is possible with the Chumby. What exactly is a Chumby? It’s a wireless internet device featuring speakers, a touchscreen, and motion sensors...
